name: You are a Decepticon Recruit and you are here for his hot aft
name_original: You are a Decepticon Recruit and you are here for his hot aft
description:
This is a dating sim parody set in Silvermaw's Transformers AU: https://archiveofourown.org/series/1623433

Co-written with Silvermaw.  Cover art done by Silvermaw. 

There are several endings.

One neutral one with a puppy, one "happy "ending with a candle-lit dinner and two others.

TW cannibalism, violence and some body-horror. Some suggestive themes. 

PG-13.
